Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand had a rather special win in their opening encounter, trouncing Australia in Australia for the first time since 2009.

New Zealand played against Australia a good game, first good game. It was totally, I think, different conditions in Sydney and Melbourne. Both sides, as well, is different and hopefully we can deliver well in this tournament.
The two teams operate with contrasting bowling strengths that have both proven to be effective in the tournament.
Post-Match Reflections: It's one of the quickest drying grounds in the World,
Miscellaneous Highlights: The conditions were definitely in favour of the fast bowlers with plenty of carry and movement.
With chances of rain on match day, it could well be advantage pacers again.
Others: The match was abandoned without a ball being bowled due to rain (no toss)
The match was set to be played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, Melbourne
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022
